description: This easy and creamy sweetcorn chowder is made even more delicious with a little heat from harissa paste.
name: Spicy Sweetcorn Chowder Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 large sweetcorn cobs, kernels chopped off
2.8 cup vegetable stock, made with 1 stock cube, hot

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil and butter in a large, deep pan on medium heat and cook the onions and celery for 5 minutes. Stir in the garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Add the corn kernels and potatoes to the pan and cook for 2 minutes. Pour over the stock, bring to the boil, reduce the heat and simmer for 15 minutes.
Remove from the heat and add 2/3 of the cream and harissa.
Serve with a swirl of cream and harissa on top.
